LLRF expert GUI section chooser dialog¶

Contain dialogs for server selection.

llrfgui.dialog.choose_server(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Prompt a selection dialog from a given list of servers. The selected server is returned. If the user cancel the dialog, the program stops.

llrfgui.dialog.in_different_process(func)[source]¶

Decorator to run the function in a different process.
